medium:
Tz'u-chou (Cizhou) type ware
Stoneware with white slip under a clear glaze
object_name: Bottle jar, one of a pair, Pair of Bottle Jars
text: These tall, waisted minimally decorated vessels are unusually elegant for Cizhou type ware. Their visual impact derives from their well-ordered formality that differs considerably from the energetically painted and cut-glaze Cizhou decoration displayed here.
title: Bottle jar, one of a pair
